title: Add messaging consistency audit for positioning recommendations across channels

sections.text: Implement a backend job that compares current messaging assets (website copy, sales deck snippets, email templates) against the latest approved positioning recommendations for the same segment. Compute a simple divergence score (e.g., missing/altered value props, differentiators, proof points) and store results per channel/segment over time. Expose flagged inconsistencies via an internal endpoint and log entries to support follow-on UI/alerting tickets.
